title: Lynda - InDesign Insider Training Print PDFs with David Blatner
description:
Lynda - InDesign Insider Training Print PDFs with David Blatner
Subject: Design, Page Layout | Software: InDesign CS6, CC
Level: Beginner | Duration: 22m 23s | Released date: May 30, 2014 
uploaded in Sept 6, 2014 by 2boweb



InDesign is the choice for designers, printers, and publishers the world over. Now you want to learn InDesign, but where to begin? It takes just 30 minutes to get up to speed and start creating or editing layouts quickly. Want to learn more? Check out InDesign CC Essential Training and InDesign Insider Training: Beyond the Essentials
